articles.author: George Hammond
articles.title: Carta customers say platform tried to trade their shares without consent - Financial Times
articles.description: CEO of investor tracking group blames rogue employee for soliciting sale of stock in start-ups
articles.content: Carta, a $7.4bn software company used by start-ups to track their investors, has been trying to trade its customers shares without consent, according to a complaint that threatens to undermine trust … [+3131 chars]

articles.author: George Hammond, Tabby Kinder
articles.title: Thrive Capital plots new fundraising as it doubles down on tech - Financial Times
articles.description: Joshua Kushner’s fund will look to raise at least $3bn to invest in hard-hit sector as VC rivals pull back
articles.content: Joshua Kushners Thrive Capital is preparing to ask investors for at least $3bn in fresh capital after the New York venture fund made mammoth bets on technology start-ups last year, even as the sector… [+3708 chars]
